Recent Projects

LCLS-data-summary [primary author]
Break out project from LCLS-psana-examples. More info to come.

LCLS-psana-examples [primary author]
Some scripts and tools that I wrote while at CXI, one of the user facilities on the Stanford Linear ACcelerator LCLS beam line.

Some of the the libraries that are used in this are: MPI, PyQtGraph, zmq, psana, ROOT, Bootstrap, jQuery, and more.
